Build-Depends: automake, debhelper (>= 11), dh-exec, liba52-dev, libavformat-dev (>= 6:10~), libjpeg-dev, libogg-dev, libsdl1.2-dev, libswresample-dev (>= 6:10~), libtool, libvorbis-dev, libxft-dev, libxi-dev, libxt-dev, libxxf86dga-dev, libxxf86vm-dev, netpbm
Package-List: libavifile-0.7-bin deb misc optional arch=any libavifile-0.7-common deb misc optional arch=all libavifile-0.7-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libavifile-0.7c2 deb libs optional arch=any
Testsuite-Triggers: dpkg-dev, g++, gstreamer1.0-libav, gstreamer1.0-plugins-good, gstreamer1.0-tools, libaubio-dev, libavutil-dev, make, pkg-config
